name: Splider
description:
-A short horror game

-Played about 1-3 mins, depending on how you play.

-This game was made for the The Fresh Game Jam by StaberDevs.

-The theme for the jam was 'Anomaly'.

-This was my first: horror game, 3d game, game jam.

-Sorry, it is Windows only.

Credits

-music: "You Are Not Safe" by Nuallán.  Link

-3d model of spiders by PsionicGames.  Link

-made in Coppercube 6 game engine
